content: **knitted house/christmas decoration in drops alpaca or drops lima the piece is worked in the round bottom up theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern z-1053 yarn group a or b ------------------------------------------------------- **size** worked in drops alpaca width = 6 5 cm height = 9 cm worked in drops lima width = 7 cm height = 10 cm **yarn** drops alpaca from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a for walls 50 g colour 100 off white / 2020 light nougat for bottom and roof 50 g colour 618 nougat / 3650 maroon / 7895 dark green / 9024 dark blush and use a left-over colour dark grey for door and window or use drops lima from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b for walls 50 g colour 0619 beige for bottom and roof 50 g colour 3609 red / 9030 dark ivy a left-over colour black for door and window **accessories** wadding 1 house weighs approx 6 g in drops alpaca and 10 g in drops lima without wadding **needles** drops double pointed needles size 3 mm **knitting gauge** drops alpaca 26 stitches in width and 34 row in height with stocking stitch on needle size 3 mm = 10 x 10 cm drops lima 23 stitches in width and 32 row in height with stocking stitch on needle size 3 mm = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
